Metric: Discussion of the integration of environmental considerations into strategic planning for data centre needs
Context:
“We work to improve our products’ energy efficiency through hardware, software and tailored efficiency solutions. Our technology and services allow us to partner with customers on their journey to build modern, sustainable data centers.”

“To improve data center efficiency and performance and deliver value to customers, we combine several elements: audit infrastructure, right-sized IT footprint, optimized HVAC functionality, intelligent platform management, and optimized workloads.”
“We enhance efficiency in client solutions, servers and storage products to minimize energy consumption.”
“Our PowerEdge servers with direct liquid cooling systems minimize energy needed to cool the data center and reduce reliance on HVAC systems.”

Metric: Description of policies and practices relating to targeted advertising and user privacy
Topic: Data Privacy, Advertising Standards & Freedom of Expression
Context:
“Dell Technologies is committed to respecting and protecting the privacy of our customers, team members and partners. Our Global Privacy Program is based on globally recognized privacy principles and frameworks, including the OECD Guidelines, the APEC Privacy Framework and the Fair Information Practices.”

“We continue to enhance our Privacy Center to make it easier and faster for customers to exercise choice and control over their personal data. In FY24, the Privacy Center became available in 74 locations globally.”
